Package model

Class Staff

java.lang.Object
com.cmas.model.User
com.cmas.model.Staff
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Staff extends User
Model class representing a staff member, inheriting properties from the User class. Staff members have the ability to create and manage camps and generate various reports for camp-related activities.
Since:
2023-11-14
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • campIDs

      private final Set<UUID> campIDs
      Set of UUIDs for each camp created by the staff member.

  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      public Staff(String name, String email, UserGroup faculty)
      Constructs a new Staff object with the name, email, and user group).
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the staff.
      email - The email of the staff.
      faculty - The user group for which the staff member belongs.

  • Method Details

    • hasCreatedCamp

      public boolean hasCreatedCamp(UUID campID)
      Checks if staff has created camp.
      Parameters:
      campID - The UUID of the camp to check.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member has created the camp, false otherwise.

    • registerNewCamp

      public void registerNewCamp(UUID campID)
      Registers a new camp created by the staff member. Adds campID to UUID Set for tracking.
      Parameters:
      campID - The UUID of the camp to register.

    • getCampIDs

      public Set<UUID> getCampIDs()
      Gets the set of UUIDs representing the camps created by the staff member.
      Returns:
      The set of camp UUIDs.

    • generateReport

      public void generateReport(int choice)
      Generates a report (.txt format) based on the specified choice. Implemented filters include Attendees, Camp Committee Members
      Parameters:
      choice - The choice for which the report is generated (1 for attendees, 2 for committee members).

    • generatePerformanceReport

      public void generatePerformanceReport()
      Generates a performance report (points) for camp committee members associated with the camps created by the staff member.
